subject: 3 CGMs committees for recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through 	CCIEs.-reg.
text: HRi 75y rTHNfuferabrot (Teq wRaev & TTHNf HART4, 4RT AAFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hcyyd T vi1-5 Q 6, Farr-10, #rqT; # fcvlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/Conciliation Committee/2024 Policy Circular No: 2.1.76/ 2024 dated 09th July, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD /conciliation/2021-Part(1) (Comp. No. 67745)} Sub: 3 CGMs committees for recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through CCIEs.-reg: Four Nos of 3-CGM committees were constituted vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 2.1.56/2022 (Comp: No. 67745) dated 18.11.2022, Policy Circular No. 2.1.58/2023 dated 15.05.2023, Policy Circular No. 2.1.65/2023 dated 04.12.2023 and Policy Circular No. 2.1.73 dated 03.05.2024 to expedite the disposal of pending cases. 2 . Now, it has been decided that Sh: Navin Kumar, CGM (T) will replace Sh: Pawan Kumar, Ex-CGM (T) in Committee No. and Sh. A.K. Jha, GM (F) & Sh: Dhanesh Kumar, GM (F) will replace Sh: B.M: Rao, Ex-CGM (F) in Committee No. and Committee No. 2 respectively for all ongoing and future cases of these committees till further orders. 3 This issue with the approval of Competent Authority. 6al0x zy (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 . Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2_ Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation. 'M T U9 NHAI Copy
